title.content: Backlink Gap Analysis tool for Competitor Analysis | Semrush

metaDescription.content: Check domain authority in comparison with competitors. Big data analytics and visualization tool from Semrush: analyzе large sets of backlinks to discover patterns, insights and gaps.

h2s.text: Three Steps to Discover Link Building Prospects
h2s.html: Three Steps to Discover Link Building Prospects

h2s.text: Compare Domains to Spot Backlink Opportunities
h2s.html: Compare Domains to Spot Backlink Opportunities
Find quality link building prospects

h3s.text: Find the Best Opportunities for Your Site
h3s.html: Find the Best Opportunities for Your Site

content.html:
1. Features

  2. Backlink Gap

Backlink Gap

Discover your backlink opportunities and find new link building prospects with the Semrush Backlink Gap analysis tool.

Try It Free

Three Steps to Discover Link Building Prospects

Compare up to 5 Domains

Enter up to 5 competitors to see what referring domains you have in common with them.

Analyze Your Results

See what referring domains you’re missing and review the Authority Score column to build a list of opportunities with the highest potential SEO impact.

Export the Data

Select a preferred time frame and review your report. You can then export the data in an excel or CSV file.

Compare Domains to Spot Backlink Opportunities

Get the most out of your competitors: compare their domains to yours and pinpoint the best backlink opportunities to reach out to.

Uncover the Gaps

Get a quick look at the gaps between you and the other websites in your niche with the most backlinks.

Try It Free

Find the Best Opportunities for Your Site

Filter the results by metrics like traffic, category, and Authority Score to see what prospects are most appropriate for your outreach.

Find quality link building prospects

Try It Free
